info.name: Android Developer - Moonlight - Revised & Black
info.description: Just added a couple of fixes to the outdated Moonlight stylesheet by smileham, and also turned the background darker black.
info.additionalInfo:
=======
Current
=======

v1.04 - Improved code text readability with softer colours. Improved package documentation aesthetics. Selected page is now highlighted in navigation. Fixed table readability.

Don't hesitate to give suggestions and feedback :)

===
Old
===
v0.2 - Fixed background and some visibility issues.
v0.1 - Revised and released.
